alert.note: Alert for Alexander (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 11:06AM CDT until May 14 at 5:18AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau and Thebes. .Recent heavy rainfall will cause rises on the Mississippi River through the middle of next week. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY, MAY 14... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Thebes. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Saturday, May 14. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 28.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Sunday morning to a crest of 36.5 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday, May 13. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
